type.Description: Type of the image. If omitted, the default value is the one defined in oned.conf (install default is OS).

persistent.Description: Persistence of the image. If omitted, the default value is NO.

dev_prefix.Description: Prefix for the emulated device this image will be mounted at. For instance, “hd”, “sd”. If omitted, the default value is the one defined in oned.conf (installation default is “hd”).

bus.Description: Type of disk device to emulate.

driver.Description: Specific image mapping driver. VMware is unsupported

fstype.Description: Type of file system to be built. This can be any value understood by mkfs unix command.

path.Description: Path to an image. This can be a path local to the frontend or HTTP(S) URL.
